## GET [/brapi/v1/samples]

```{r}
library(brapi)
library(magrittr)
  # make sure brapiTS::mock_server() is running in a separate process

 
   con <- ba_connect() %>% ba_login()

  sampleData <- list(
    plantId = 1,
    plotId = 1,
    takenBy = "RS",
    sampleDate = "01",
    sampleType = "x",
    tissueType = "tt",
    notes = "notes"
  )

  ba_show_info(TRUE)
  ba_samples_save(con, sampleData)
  ba_show_info(FALSE)

```

### Response

Code: 200 (application/json)

```json
`r json`
```
